data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 37,773 believers in Gonda that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gonda, Uttar Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Gonda, Uttar Pradesh, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Gonda, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Gonda.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Gonda prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Beriya (Hindu traditions) people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Gonda to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Gonda, Uttar Pradesh, India, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Gonda, Uttar Pradesh, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
